1.content: Welcome to Jacobs Hill High School! Who would you like to write about?
1.title: Welcome!

11.content:
Katie Greeley- A brunette 17 year old who plays soccer and lacrosse. She has brunette hair a thin figure but also has four brothers who are obese slobs. She's dedicated to stay thin but secretly wishes to laze around all day like the rest of her family.

Kylie Greer- A tan, black haired 17 year old cheerleader who likes to make fun of fat girls with her friends Christina and Samantha.

Monica Wayne- The head cheerleader at her old school, but transferred after being kicked off the team. She's looking for a fresh start at Jacobs High, but also has a sweet tooth. Brunette and tan.

Mackenzie Curley- A blonde field hockey player and cheerleader in the winter who tries to stay thin to avoid turning out like her obese slob of a mother. Kind and quick witted, she does have a fondness for barbecued foods however.

Or you can choose someone else!
11.title: New Students

choices: It’s nothing you should be fine in a couple of weeks
I’m sorry to say your leg is broken
111.content: It’s Katie’s first game of high school lacrosse and it is different. Katie started to notice the differences of her high school everyone was a good 100lbs over weight at least and that included her team. When she asked her team leader Josie (a bottom heavy brunette with olive skin.) she said don’t worry you’ll catch up. It was unnerving to say the least, when she was at practices she barely does anything most times Josie just takes them out to eat appalling amounts of food. Katie tried her best to avoid eating it but recently she’s been indulging. At the game she’s the fasts on her team obviously but her team is a battering ram anyone comes close they get dropped by a ton of lard. Mid game it started to rain and one of Katie’s team mates slipped and fell on Kate. There is a load crack.
111.title: Katie Greeley

choices: Her mom doesn’t want boys look at her daughter so what can you do
Summer is jealous fatten up her friend
112.content:
Kylie Greer was in for a surprise. She had heard the rumors from friends but it was laughable. Jacob’s Hills curse they called it. According to some of her more superstitious friends tales is that the popular kid in middle school would lose there control become a real porkers. Kylie laughed at the rumors. First of all the last three leaders of the middle school (Rachel Freels, Madeline Bears, and Kate White) were absolute monsters when it came to dieting and manipulation. Secondly even if they had fallen Kylie was stronger than all three combined. In all honesty Kylie new that she was only stronger than two of them and that if all three were fat she might actually be in trouble.

          “Oh, honey I’m so excited, your first day of high school. Sigh it... e....it seems that it was just yes true day that you my little baby girl and... and now look at you. Your a beautiful young women.” Kylie’s mom was driving the car to Jacob’s and had begun sobbing. It had just been the two of them ever since her father had died in a car accident when she was five. Her father left a large enough fortune behind that her mother didn’t have to go to work but she would some times work at a local beauty shop for fun.

          “Mom your going to embarrass me,” Kaylie blushed with fake annoyance. Kaylie was a bit hypocritical about larger people often making fun or being discussed by them, when her mother was a bit over weight from the years of stress of being an only parent after the death of her loving husband.

          “Ok,ok, well here we are let me get a hug from you.” Kylie’s mom parked the car and quickly exited running to her daughters side. She was a half inch taller than her daughter wearing a pants suit which pinched her middle (her belly still stuck out) and should plenty of her breast(which were like H in the cup sizes). Her thighs rubbed the inter way to her daughter. Kylie was embraced in a warm soft hug that she had grown so used to. They hugged for a long time until her mom gave a kiss on her cheek releasing her.

          “Bye mom love you.” Kylie said

          “Love you too,” Mrs. Greer was a little chocked up seeing her daughter go towards the school. She did get really uncomfortable when she saw the way a boy was looking at her but what could she do.(hit this is possible foreshadowing.)

***

          “Hey there bestie,” a familiar voice called out to Kylie. It was her oldest friend Summer.

          “Hey Summer how’ve you been,” the two embrace each other.

          “You know same old, same old. But, man did you see the way Make Wilder was looking at you?” They both look back at a handsome young man, when they make eye contact he nods toward them and they giggle. “It makes me kind of jealous of you that all the boys look your way and only when your with someone or gone do they look my way.”(hit hit possible foreshadowing) She said a little upset

          “Well you know I can’t help it. Oh, gotta go don’t want to be late.” She puffed out her chest before running off so the guys could get a good view.
***
          “WHAT DO YOU MEAN THERE IS NO MORE ROOM FOR CHEERLEADING.” Kylie frantically spouted at the guidance counselor.

          “I mean what I said, now I have some more creative type clubs if you’d be interested in any of them that you could join.” The counselor said calmly offering a brochure.

          “No thanks I think I’ll just head to lunch ,” she said disheartened. Kylie walked to the lunch room and after grabbing her lunch she realized none of her friends share the same lunch with her. “Well what a great day,” she decides to get some prof on that the hole curse thing was wrong.

          She first found Rachel. Rachel used to be a an ebony goddess with curves for days, but when Kylie saw her today she was sitting down on two giant cushion sized ass cheeks thighs touching to the knees. Her stomach laid on thighs roll on roll. Her breast jutted out and relaxed on her stomach rolls. Her face was pudgy and had a double chin. Her arms large and plushy were wrapped around what Kylie assumed was her boyfriend who was feeding her a drum stick as though she were the queen of a mighty empire. Kylie was horrified by it but was worse she still fashionable some how. There was still hope though two more girls to go.

          Madeline had been a blond track star and a merciless bitch. She hadn’t turned out well either she sat next to her tank friends who were bigger than before but were dwarfed by Madeline who’s colossal Stomach which pocked out of her shirt and rubbed against the table. Her thighs and hips while not as big as Rachel’s they were still large. Her breast were massive and it would be hard to imagine her crossing her arms around her boobs. She had huge greasy cheeks and a triple chin. Her puffy arms the size of pillows were shoving food into her mouth. This scared Kylie but Kate would stay strong right?

          Kate didn’t stay strong. She had a bob cut of her natural red hair and was making out with another chubby girl. She didn’t have a huge stomach it was actually pretty small her hips were large her ass starting to spill of her chair her thighs touching to mid thigh. Her breast are massive around the size of watermelons the largest in the school. Her arms are puffy and wrapped around her lover. This started to scare Kylie but that couldn’t be it.
112.title: First day

113.content:
Monica was looking for a change not in just her life but in the world. You see the reason why Monica was kicked off her cheer team was as the principal put it “a lack of motivation,”. She was very motivated in the cheer Team just not for the right reason. She liked bigger girls very attractive. So much so that she found ways to fatten up her team mates with out them noticing. Unfortunately the coach did notice but she couldn’t prove it so she made up a reason and got her transferred.
Monica was not only chubby chaser but also a chemistry genius. That’s how she tricked them by slipping a little bit of the serum on there food that would make them uncontrollably hungry and would slow the metabolism for twelve hours. This all was great for Monica but she wanted more she wanted to make a serum that would solely effect women, permanently slow their metabolism, and cause them to be natural more hungry permanently. It was a good thing she transferred less reputation and more ignorance. Now who would be her first test subject.


         The Jessica’s: the hottest girls in school my be hard to get to but the resistance would prove the the serum effective. Jessica Davis: A hottie Latino girl she knows the secrets of every one (except monica). Jessica Smith: Curve African American everyone wants to date her and her dad is on the student council. Jessica Pond: rich as hell blond she is the leader of the group and is a stone cold bitch.

         Mrs. Kimble a new teacher and wants the acceptance of the students so very venerable to desertion.

          May: just a random student with a thin figure.
113.title: Monica Wayne

115.content:
Samantha Roman- Brunette cheerleader with a fat ass. She hangs out with her friends Kylie and Christina but doesn't make fun of fat girls like the other two do. She's nice and smart, but also tends to be lazy.

Christina Sutton- Star lacrosse player with a huge appetite but thin figure. Even with her huge appetite, she makes fun of fat girls with her friends Kylie and Samantha. Entitled, spoiled and arrogant attitude while also being lazy.

Or you can choose a different character!
115.title: More Options

1153.content:
Gina Dash- Transfer student from Seton Hall Prep in New Jersey due to her mother being worried about her gaining too much weight on the softball team there. Brunette, kind, courteous, but also a huge appetite

Jillian Pagnotti- Team Captain of the softball team. Thin figure and fat ass but pressured by the rest of her family being obese to stay thin. Humble and non-arrogant athlete who tends to overeat on pizza.

Or you can choose more characters!
1153.title: Softball Players

11533.content:
Kat Sarnicki- Polish exchange student, not used to American fast food and eating customs. Shy, long, wavy, black hair and smart.

Gianna Magnus- Transfer student from Italy who has a desire to perform in the school plays. Brunette hair, thin figure, stress eats when she's under pressure .

Or you can choose a different character!
11533.title: Transfer Students

115331.content:
Kay was in an absolute wonderland in her new home of Jacobs Hill, Illinois. Compared to her home in Poland, it was an absolute wealth of shopping and food, with the eldest daughter of her host family driving her around to introduce her to each American traditional delicacy before school started up in two weeks. As she bonded with her new family, she fell in love with hamburgers, corn dogs, French fries, fried chicken, you name it. She was overwhelmed, eating two generous fast food meals daily.

By the time she was preparing for school on her first morning as an American high school student, she found her jeans harder to button, her chubby belly and her slightly thicker thighs creating some stress in the fabric. She tugged a clingy white tank top on, which left none of her upper curves to the imagination. She finished the outfit with a red flannel shirt, left fully open in the front. She brushed her teeth, fixed up her hair, ate breakfast, then headed out with her book bag to the bus stop, five minutes before pickup time, per the instructions of the schedule.

She boarded the bus once it came, seeing that it was mostly full, with a single girl sat near the front.

“Can I sit wit you?” Kat asked in perfectly structured English, but with a messy and horrible accent.

The girl looked up at her, seeing both her potbelly and smiling face. She responded...
115331.title: Kat Sarnicki

115333.content:
Paige Fisher- Soccer star, very injury prone, brunette/black hair, injury prone, likes to snack during games

Lily Daniels- Softball star at her old school, her mother Amy is a health freak, looking to join the team here, secretly wonders what it's like to be fat.
115333.title: More Options

1153333.content:
Melissa Atkins- Head cheerleader at her own school, very obese and slobbish mother, blonde hair, lazy and relaxed attitude

Hannah Meyers- Brunette hair, star basketball player, has a problem with overeating snacks
1153333.title: More Options

11533333.content:
Morgan Bader- Aspiring artist who is very lazy, tends to overeat, doesn't do any sports, brunette hair with blonde highlights, not thin but not fat figure

Abigail Doherty- Former middle school cheerleader it stopped in high school and gained a lot of weight, 300 pounds, brunette hair, nice but gets tired easily and loves to overeat.
11533333.title: More Options

12.content:
1. Alex Pitzaferro, very fat former softball player, Caucasian brunette, became fat after getting heavily invested in comic book movies.

2. Nicole Harris, short, fat blonde, former cheerleader, fattened up by her jealous older sisters after years of her being bitchy and selfish, which only got worse after her fattening.

3. Ella Harris, tall, blonde sister of Nicole, very skinny, recently experienced a popularity boost following the dethroning of Nicole.

4. Emily Harris, twin sister of Ella, soccer player, experienced the same popularity spike as Ella.

5. More options
12.title: Experienced Students

choices: 250lbs geeky girl who still had some fashion
250lbs and still trying to be sporty hiding her inner geek.
121.content:
"(Let's get some things down before we start our story. Alex's father is John Pitzaferro a sales man at Pumps unlimited and often travels but when he is home he spoils his wife and kids.
Alex's mother Sam Pitzaferro works at a day care and dotes on her children but she doesn't approve of Alex's weight gain, the hypocrite.
Alex has an older brother, sister, and a younger sister. Her brother (Jake) is the normal stareo type over protective and strong as he'll, he made sure no picked on or dated any of his sisters if he didn't trust them. He has left for college but that doesn't mean he won't be home in a heart beat if any thing happens. Julia her older sister is a fitness nut and will pick on Alex about her weight but shuts up when her girlfriends around who's a bit bigger than Alex. Susan the youngest by 2 years is a bit of a chubster takes after Alex most and wants to do almost everything Alex does, it gets annoying but it's a little cute.)"

Ok yeah yeah, what's with all the exposition I came her to read about a teenage girl filling out to the size of a blimp, well I like a little story behind the story will I'm reading this stuff so calm down here it is.

Alex's eye slid open to her alarm blipping off almost emedently she slammed the snooze button and shuffled her weight to get more comfortable. Her small snooze didn't last though. Her mother called out to wake her up, "Alex time to get up you'll be late for school... god... if you dont wake up your food will get cold."

At that her eyes shot open. She lifted her arms and legs in the air and swung them to the side just to build up the momentum to get out of bed and land on her feet with a loud slam. Her mother had told her not to do it as it always made her think the ceiling was going to cave even when she was in soft ball (a code word for skinny). She rushed over to her dresser whos top was littered with softball trophies of a different life which she left behind.

She pulled on a pair of laggings which could have been a parachute for a small person. It got stuck bellow her butt cheeks for a second but slid past adventually. Alex let out a sigh of relief she didn't need to buy a new pair of laggings *yet*. She grabbed a large shirt with a famous Netflix character saying leggo my eggo.

Alex grabbed hellboy volume 1 this should last her for the day until she could grab a new volume from the comic book store after school.

"Are you up Alex?" Her mother shouted at the stair well ready to get her lazy daughter out of bed.

"Coming mom," just grabbing a few things Clair replied a little annoyed. She had only ignored the call for breakfeast once and it had become her mother's routine to call her a third time everyday. "Just gotta do some make up and I'll be right down."

Alex trotted to the upstairs bathroom. Their was a full length mirror to her right she admired her self for a little bit.
121.title: Alex Pitzaferro

122.content:
Nicole waddled into school on the first day of the second semester, her golden hair in a ponytail with tasteful side bangs, her pale face coated in at least a full pound of makeup. She was dressed in ungodly tight skinny jeans with several holes in the front, some of them made by her rapid expansion. On top, she wore a long sleeved gray VS Pink shirt, with her cheerleader windbreaker left open over it. Despite the fact that she was off the squad, she could hardly process the reality and still dressed as though she was still cheering. She immediately went towards the athletic wing, calorie-laden Starbucks trienta in her chubby hand.

'If cheer won't have my skills, then I guess another team will.' She thought with a smirk.

As she heaved her obesity through the halls of Jacobs Hill, she turned virtually every head in the building, but for all the wrong reasons. They stared at her in disgust. Her thighs shifted and oozed past one another, with clear wear on the inside of her jeans. her overfed belly bounced and heaved along with her heavy breasts, contained comically in a pushup bra. Her mouth hung open, her labored breath and heavy footfalls being very loud to bystanders and fellow pedestrians. She couldn't have interpreted this more incorrectly, however.

'Hm! They love me! I see you all staring...' She thought and stepped up to the board of team listing, with three major options that appealed to her.
122.title: The Disgraced Cheerleader

choices: Nichole’s mom loves her idea of the track
Her sisters discourage her joining the team.
She goes straight to a party after she get off the bus.
1221.content:
“Ya know track would be nice,” she mumbled to her friend Cassidy. Grabbing a hand full of chips. The two of them where on there free period so they decided to spend it eating. This was not uncommon for most of the female students just slightly more for Nichole.

“What are you on about?” Cassidy said after having a huge sip from her bucket sized Slurpy. On the side of the drink it said regular sized. Cassidy was another cheerleader who got kick of the team. She was thinner than Nichole a lot thinner.

“Joining some sport I need to keep my girlish figure,” at that note Nichole shifted her mass in the chair (barely moving because she did not really fit in the chair.) to do a sexy pose. Cassidy looked her up and down. She saw Nicky’s (Nicholes nickname.) full frame on display. Nicky’s face was plushy hiding away her check bones and falling in to a second chin. Her arms were pushing her DD sized breast together to make them look larger, needless to say it was not necessary. Said arms had two small pillows of fat attached to them. Right bellow her breast was a double laired belly that started to take up more residents on her lap every day. Speaking of her lap their was no gap that her tummy could slide through for her massive thunder thighs where in the way. Her ass which was fairly sized was almost stuck in the chair Cassidy gave it a thought and concluded that even if she joined track she would give it a month before Nichole would start getting stuck in chairs complaining that they must have changed out the chairs that couldn’t handle her thick body.

“Sure,” Cassidy said unimpressed with Nicky’s ignorance. Nicky was the fattest girl in their grade but not by much. It was weird in this town for one reason or another after entering high school or moving in to this town all the women struggle to keep their weights down the reason for this is a mystery, some kind of curse, alien radiation, or perhaps it’s just because of the high schools individual deals with a couple of fast food chains to keep the food in the school stocked not that Cassidy was complaining about the schools deal. Think all this over Cassidy looked down at her own body. She did not have the same assets as her friend in the chest department being fairly flat with only a B sized bra to her name. She had a muffin top and saddle bags hanging over her belt. Her thighs touched but not half way down like Nicky and her ass was giving her a comfortably cushion on the seat. She thought to her self how long it was going to take before she would be Nicky’s size.

“You don’t think I can do it,” Nicky spat at Cassidy interrupting her train of thought.

“Nope,” responded Cassidy nonchalant

“Well I’ll prove you wrong!” Nicky ate the last of the family sized bag of chips and waddled out of the room (presumably to get a slurpy from the schools café).

“And when you do I’ll pay for lunch.” Cassidy said from the corner of her mouth as she took one last slurp from her drink.

The rest of the day had gone pretty normally for Nicky going to classes, eating snacks through out the day, bumping into the larger students (Err I mean upper class men.). Nicky was stomping down the hall in frustration stripping out of her iced coffee, which might as well have been ice cream. Still frustrated at her friends disbelief in her she started to had home mumbling ‘I’ll show her’. She was stopped in a crowd right in front of the doors out. ‘What’s going on’ Nicky thought when she over heard a couple of boy students.

“Ugh, the seniors got themselves stuck in all the doors Again. It’s so frustrating.” Said the one boy.

“ Hey at least we get a better look at them.” He sneakered getting up on his tippy toes to get a better view over the crowd.

‘What pigs getting so fat as to get stuck in the doors,’ Nicky thought as she ate a donut that she got from the cafe. Soon the staff came by and were able to pray them from the door frames while discussing upgrading the doors.

Cassidy got on her bus and went home.
1221.title: Track and Field

choices: The First Offseason Practice is Tomorrow
Nicole comes to her senses and doesn't join the team
Ella and Emily sabotage their sister once again
1222.content:
"Maybe I can try out for the softball team." Nicole said to herself, wheezing as she signed her name on the list of people interested and took a long sip of her calorie filled drink. Letting loose a fart as she turned around, the surrounding students continued to stare at her in revulsion, still amazed at how the grade's queen bee could experience such a downfall, and still act like she's hot shit even when she's at the bottom of the popularity chain. "Ugh I'm starved." Nicole said to herself, clutching her massive belly as it roared for food.

After the remainder of the day at school, Nicole drove her customized coupe home, where her two older twin sisters, Ella and Emily, were enjoying a lunch of bacon, egg and cheese bagels. Unlike Nicole, her two older sisters were rail thin, lacking any signs of curves. "Hey Ella! Hey Emily!" Nicole said, wheezing as she wiped the sweat off of her forehead from waddling into the house. "Hey Nicole. We got you the cookies you asked for." Ella said emotionlessly as Nicole smiled greedily. She ripped the bag from her sisters hands, waddling into the living room and tearing open the bag, stuffing the cookies in her mouth quickly. Nicole savored the flavor of the cookies, licking her lips to capture all of the remaining crumbs. "So good." She said to herself as she discarded the bag and wiped the crumbs off of her tight and messy clothes.

"So how was school today?" Emily questioned as Nicole scratched her jiggly stomach. "Same as usual. Except I decided to join the softball team." Nicole proudly said as her sisters let out a laugh. "You playing softball? You get tired from walking around the house. What makes you think you could actively play a sport?" Emily said as Nicole grabbed a bag of chips. "I have to keep my status in school somehow. I was getting bored of cheer anyway." Nicole smugly replied as her sister's rolled her eyes. Nicole tried her best to ignore her complete downfall with false confidence, and it was pretty annoying. "Whatever, I can't wait to see you on the field sis." Ella finished as she chuckled. "Whatever." Nicole rolled her eyes while munching loudly of the chips.

Mrs. Harris than came home with a huge takeout bag from Moe's Southwest Grill. Nicole licked her lips as her stomach roared once again. She greeted her mother with a quick hello before grabbing her deluxe steak burrito, quesadillas and nachos and started to pig out. "Did anything interesting happen at school sweetie?" She asked with a smile as Nicole let out a thunderous belch which shook the room. "Yea, I decided to try out for the softball team." Nicole said, taking a rare break from devouring her food as Mrs. Harris' eyes widened. "Are you sure you want to play for the team dear?" She asked as Nicole let out a fart and stuffed her face with some quesadillas. "I'm positive. I'm in the best shape I've ever been." She replied, taking a handful of nachos and dripping some cheese on her already stained blouse. Nicole polished off her meal then waddled into the other room to take a nap.

"Hey mom." Ella and Emily simultaneously said as they walked in together. "Hey girls. I got you the taco salads you asked for." "Thanks." They said, sitting at the table and beginning to neatly eat. "So did you two hear Nicole is trying out for softball?" Mrs. Harris asked as the three girls laughed. "That's gonna be too funny." Ella said as Emily nodded in agreement. "She'll be off the team in a week, guaranteed." Emily said. "How could she even run? She has to wheeze whenever she walks." Ella said as the sisters continued to laugh. Mrs. Harris was beginning to worry. "I hope she doesn't embarrass herself too much out there."
1222.title: Swing And A Miss

choices: Miraculously, she does well and earns a spot on the team.
She unsurprisingly performs poorly, getting cut from the team.
12223.content:
Despite the fact that she was all but doomed to fail her tryout and be cut from the softball team before she even made it on, Emily and Ella decided they shouldn't leave any margin of error, and thus broke open their wallets and went back into their old ways of dietary sabotage of their sister. There were two days between when Nicole signed up and when she would try out for softball, so they would have to make the most of what they had.

She woke up on Tuesday to the smell of bacon flooding her nose, immediately roused and excited by it. She rolled quickly out of bed, her belly providing a good point of leverage to fling herself off. She heaved over to her dresser and pulled on a pair of black leggings which were slightly too small, allowing some of her skin to be seen through them. Following that, she pulled on a Paramore t-shirt, then a mint green North Face hoodie over that. She lazily brushed her hair and scrambled downstairs, finding her sisters preparing bacon, toast, eggs, you name it.

"Oh, God! That looks so good! How much is mine?" She asked, automatically assuming she was entitled to at least a third, if not half of the feast.

"All of it. You need to store up the energy for your big day on Thursday." Ella said with a forced smile, while suffering on the inside from getting up so early.

Nicole squeed in excitement and took a seat at the table while Emily served a plate of toast with butter, jam, and peanut butter spread over each piece, which she promptly dove into, smashing the toast into her greedy lips. Within the next twenty minutes, she managed to pack in at least twenty five hundred calories, more than a healthy man's general income. After belching and without thanking her sisters, as usual, she got up and grabbed her bag, then headed off to school, applying makeup to her messy face with one hand while she drove with the other.

The next two days went very similarly, with Ella and Emily ensuring that their precious big little sister had plenty to eat at both breakfast and dinner, with plenty of snacks and perhaps a medicated milkshake in between.

After school on Thursday, obese and somewhat high, Nicole showed up to tryouts in Adidas spandex and a Nike hoodie, her hair held back and her mind focused on performance.
12223.title: Like Giving Candy to a Baby

choices: Kat and Nicole hit it off, and Nicole's plan succeeds
Nicole is too slobbish for Kat, so Kat doesn't befriend her
122232.content:
Unsurprisingly, Nicole did hilariously bad in tryouts. She couldn't make contact with the ball, missed every grounder, dropped every catch, the only good value she bought to the team was the humor of her pants splitting when she bent down to field a hit. Suffice to say, the tryout was not a success, but that didn't effect Nicole's mindset. "That was a great tryout. I'm a lock to make the team." She thought to herself while heavily wheezing.

Inside the dugout, the rest of the ladies made sure to keep their distance from the former most popular girl in her grade. Nicole wreaked of body odor from all the exercise and she kept farting from the huge lunch of four burgers she had polished off earlier. "Why is she even here?" Ashley Rivera, one of the best players on the team asked her group of friends. "She's just trying to regain her popularity. She's so stupid." Sarah Simms, the varsity captain, said as the majority of the girls laughed. Sarah had remembered Nicole from cheerleading. While she was popular, she always slacked and depended on her natural talent and looks instead of actually practicing, not to mention she was incredibly lazy. "Is she really that bad?" Gina Dash, a new student, asked as all the girls nodded. "Yea, I remember last year, she started gaining weight and becoming a slob. Everyone alienated her. I felt kinda bad at first bur after she still acted stuck up, I felt no sympathy." Ashley responded. "It's the first pig I've ever seen act so spoiled. Usually they just eat their guts out and smell like shit." Sarah said as the girls hilariously laughed. Nicole couldn't hear them, since she was so focused on eating the chips she had packed in her bag.

"How was I cut!?" Nicole asked herself, looking at the list Coach Bauman tweeted the next day. There were only two names, but she was one of them, along with Kat Sarnicki, a new exchange student that she had never heard of. "Whatever, I'm too good for sports anyway." Nicole said as her stomach groaned. "I'll just cut next period and get some lunch. It doesn't matter." Nicole said as the bell rang, prompting her to waddle to the cafeteria.

Nicole wheezed a sigh of relief as she reached the cafeteria. While she used to sit with her friends, she now sat by herself, stuffing her face with as much food as she could eat in the forty-five minute lunch period. She set down her bag and waddled to the lunch lime, picking at the wedgie her tight Jacobs Hill cheer sweatpants were forming. The popular girls table, where Nicole used to sit, laughed at her as she waddled by. "I can't believe I was her best friend." Melissa Frank thought to herself as Nicole slowly made her way to the lunch line. "They're just jealous of me." She wheezed to herself, letting out a belch as she reached the back of the line. Students in front of her held their noses as they scented her repulsive aroma. Nicole was sweating just from the short walk. As she waited, a girl walked up to her. She looked foreign, s little chubby in the middle and was all alone.

"Hello, I recognize you from the softball tryouts. I am Kat. Kat Sarnicki." She said as Nicole rolled her eyes. "Yea, yea, yea. Whatever. Listen, a girl like me can't be seen with someone like you. I'm actually popular." Nicole replied as Kat chuckled. "For being the school laughing stock? Please, everyone on the team was making fun of you yesterday." Kat responded. "Thats.... Not true." Nicole quietly said as Kat rolled her eyes. "Ugh, whatever. Surely your already low reputation can't be ruined that much by me talking to you could it?" Kat asked as Nicole shrugged her flabby shoulders. "I guess not." Nicole said as Kat stood next to her.

When they reached the front of the lunch line, Nicole ordered a whopping three burgers and two chicken sandwiches, but Kat followed it up by ordering two burgers and two sandwiches, which surprised Nicole. "You can eat that much?" Nicole asked, grabbing two bags of Doritos and two bottles of Vitamin Water. "Yea. I'm from Poland, so I'm just getting used to all of this American food." Kat responded as Nicole started thinking to herself. "Hmm, that's interesting. Maybe I could trick this girl into feeding me. That could save me a lot of energy." Nicole thought to herself.
122232.title: Getting the Snips

1222321.content:
As they sat down alone at Nicole's lunch table, the obese blonde opened up her mouth expectantly, having a surge of cleverness for all the wrong reasons.

Kat looked at her strangely as she unwrapped her spicy chicken sandwich. "Why are you having your mouth open?"

"Ugh, guess I gotta explain it to you." Nicole rolled her eyes. "It's customary in America that when someone is super popular, the least popular people have to feed them by hand." She smirked devilishly, but in her mind.

"Oh, if it is a custom, I guess..." Kat said doubtfully as she took one of Nicole's burgers and lifted it to her lips, allowing her to take bites at her leisure, the low quality sandwich filling up her belly aptly.

Nicole smiled and swallowed the last bite. "So is Kat your full name?"

"Nope, my full name is Katarzyna. But Kat is much easier for Americans to say. I found that out from my foster sister." She explained as she got a large bite out of her own sandwich, then got Nicole started on her next one.

Nicole talked while she ate, like the pig she was. "I mean, it sounds pretty, but yeah, I'm not even gonna try to pronounce it." After that, she shut, up, accepting all of the food off of her tray like the greedy hog she was. Afterwards, she rested and rubbed her stuffed belly, while Kat finished up her own sizable meal. They decided they would hang out after school, and narrowed it down to two possibilities.
1222321.title: The American Dream

choices: The two hanging out more has had an effect on Kat's weight
The two hanging out has had more of an effect on Nicole's figure
Nicole's mother becomes concerned of her weight
12223211.content:
"What is this place?" Kat questioned as Nicole smiled and parked her car. "This is the Jacobs Hill mall, probably my favorite place in the world." Nicole said, heaving open her door and waddling outside. "What do you do at malls? We don't really have those in Poland." Kat said as she walked with Nicole towards the entrance. "You can do anything here. Eat, shop, watch movies, or just hang out. I used to go here all the time with my friends." Nicole said. "Then what happened?" Kat asked as Nicole sighed. "They're always busy for some reason. I'm sure they'll be free one day." Nicole said as they entered the mall.

Kat's jaw dropped when she stepped foot into the mall. She was amazed by the scene of all the shops, all the food places, and all the people. "Come on, let's go to the food court first Imm starved!" Nicole said as she waddled ahead towards the food court. Kat followed, slowing her pace to stay next to her obese friend. "I wish the walk to the food court was shorter." Nicole wheezed, with her face turning red and sweat beginning to form. "What do they have at the food court?" Kat asked. "You could get pizza, burgers, chicken, Chinese food, hot dogs, literally anything you want! My mouth is watering from just listing the options." Nicole said, reaching the escalator that led to the food court. "Ugh, I can't wait. I'm so starving!" Nicole excitedly announced as Kat looked at her perplexed. "Even after your giant lunch?" Kat questioned as Nicole licked her lips. "You have to get used to American culture. Here people stuff themselves until they can't move. You can eat as much as you want." Nicole said. "Then how is most of the school thin?" Kat asked as Nicole rolled her eyes. "Whatever, we're here. I'm gonna get my food and we can meet at a table." Nicole said as she eagerly ran towards Popeye's and Panda Express.

Kat walked to a table carrying a tray with a simple cheeseburger and fries meal from Wendy's. As she was calmly eating her meal, Nicole came waddling over balancing a massive amount of trays. She had meals from Popeye's, Panda Express, Wendy's, Sbarro and Taco Bell. "Let's eat!" She yelled as she dug into her humongous meal. Bits of food dropped onto her clothes and face as she ate like she was possessed. She looked like a pig, sloppily stuffing her face as farts slipped out while she ate. "Is this what all Americans are like?" Kat laughed to herself as she was mesmerized by the way Nicole ate. "That food was so good." Nicole said, clutching her stomach after she finished the remains of her feast.

"What else is there to do here?" Kat asked as the two girls walked around the mall slowly, still full from their respective meals. "We could go shopping. One of my favorite stores is up ahead." Nicole said as she waddled into Lane Bryant, the only store that had comfortable clothing in her elephantine size. Walking in, one of the employees sighed. She recognized this slobbish girl since she came at least once a week into the store. Picking out some blouses that would soon be stained, Nicole happily whipped out her credit card to pay for the clothes. Kat looked around the store and saw that all of the customers were overweight.

"Did you get any clothes Kat?" Nicole asked as Kat shook her head. "That store's not really for me. I don't need plus sized clothes." Kat said as Nicole turned red with anguish. "These aren't plus sized clothes!" Nicole screamed as Kat laughed. "Then how come every girl in there was fat?" Kat asked as Nicole rolled her eyes. "I don't know. It's just what's in style right now." Nicole said as a fart slipped out in the middle of her rant. "You're funny Nicole. I'm glad we're friends." Kat said as Nicole smiled back. Kat could be a headache sometimes but at least she was nice.
12223211.title: Afternoons At The Mall

125.content:
1. Claire Mueller, thin but curvy pale brunette, volleyball player, academically smart, historically bitchy, in a family where both her older sister and mother have become obese.

2. Holly Boyle, very thin, short, blonde cheerleader and dancer, very energetic, much nicer than her friend Claire.

3. More choices.
125.title: More choices

choices: Stop off at McDonald's before school
1251.content:
Claire woke up at her desk suddenly as her phone blasted her alarm directly in her face, the light nearly blinding her before she quickly hit the off button and turned the screen off, lifting her head up and groaning. She had fallen asleep just three hours ago, her head buried deep into her AP US History textbook, with a notebook, water bottle, and several pens surrounding her. She stood up from her chair and cracked her back, stripped naked, then walked across the hall to take a shower at the tender hour of five thirty in the morning.

Once she was sufficiently clean, she came back over to her bedroom and pulled on a pair of gray leggings, then a black hoodie with the Sky High Volleyball Club logo on it in red. She quickly brushed her hair and pulled it back with a gray Nike headband. She went back to the bathroom and began applying makeup to her pale, tired face. Her eyes were bloodshot and accentuated by dark circles under them. Unfortunately, this had become a very common theme. After taking the task of participating in both school and club volleyball, plus taking on a score of honors and AP classes, had begun to take its toll on her body and psyche, leading to many late nights and stressful days.

As she went downstairs and passed her obese mother, then got in her car, she had a choice to make.
1251.title: The Stress of Success

1253.content:
1. Caroline Moriarty, short, black hair, usually wearing a spray tan, with ample, almost chubby curves, another bitchy part of Claire's friend group.

2. Libby Griffin, tallish, golden blonde, with a more stocky body than her friends Holly and Claire, but not more than Caroline. Also contends with type 1 diabetes.

3. More choices.
1253.title: More choices

12533.content:
Dezarae Acosta, wavy black hair, Mexican, curvy but athletic figure, energetic, loud, a stereotypical airhead. part of the varsity cheer squad. Has a love of candy and traditional Mexican food.

Lauren Michaels, curly light red hair, medium height, curvy figure, very quiet, but has a lot of friends, part of the varsity cheer squad. Known to eat when under stress.

Or choose more options!
12533.title: Varsity Cheerleaders

125333.content:
Melissa Frank, tall, golden blonde, curvy but athletic figure, very social, junior varsity cheerleader. Often feels that her curves are inferior to those of her squadmates.

Ashley Rivera, medium height, straight black hair, half Mexican, very intelligent and opinionated, softball and volleyball athlete. Very lazy in the off season.
125333.title: Even More Options

1253333.content:
Hannah Klein, tall, curly brown hair with the ends dyed red, tanned skin, interested in art, lowkey hippy, and a varsity volleyball player, both at school and in clubs. Prone to injuries, often out of sports.

Alyssa Stevenson, very intelligent, shorter, brunette hair, very large breasts, a big fan of nerdy things like comic books and video games, not involved in any athletics.
1253333.title: More choices

12533333.content:
Jessica Paul, very short, short brunette hair, virtually no curves, very smart, a talented singer and actress who competes for leading roles in school plays and musicals. Has a talent and interest in cooking, with hopes to be a chef.

Zoe McLaughlin, quite tall, short blonde hair, varsity tennis player, soft but thin figure. Kind of an oddball, having strange taste in entertainment and style.
12533333.title: More choices

125333333.content:
Maddie Thiel, very tall at 6 foot, long brown hair, varsity basketball guard, chunky figure, with huge thighs and ass, chronic overeater and notoriously lazy.

Rachel Yonamine, talented violinist, short black hair, glasses, quite tall, decent curves, very committed and almost obsessed with her music, which leads to lapses and even complete ignorance in diet and exercises.
125333333.title: More Choices

1253333333.content:
Sarah Simms, tall, straight dark brown hair, tan skin, thin figure, captain of the varsity cheer squad.

Jada Kreischer, tall, stick thin, brown hair with blonde highlights, Sarah's best friend, varsity cheerleader, often has dreams and fantasies of letting herself go, but fights against them.
1253333333.title: Some more cheerleaders

12533333333.content:
Nicole Rocha, short, dark blonde, tanned skin, curvy athletic build, varsity cheerleader, not very intelligent, incredibly vain and social.

Natalie Erbes, very short, light blonde, varsity cheerleader, has a 'whatever' attitude, Nicole's best friend, just as vain as she is.
12533333333.title: Even More Cheerleaders

125333333333.content:
1. Lily Falconer, short, slightly chubby but not yet overweight, brown hair, boob-heavy build. Very energetic and excitable, huge fan of nerd stuff, most specifically DC Comics.

2. More choices.
125333333333.title: More Choices

13.content:
Carmen Keane- A thin 24 year old math teacher with black hair and tanned skin. Very shy with a sweet tooth.

Lauren Reiner- New Health teacher, 27 years old, former college softball player and very anti-obesity. Brunette, tanned skin, generously sized ass.

Lacey Thompson- PE teacher. Former trainer at the YMCA who gained a notorious amount of weight. 26 years old, blonde, avid smoker and stress eater.

Madison Banks- New Social Studies Teacher, former Cowboys cheerleader, moved from Texas to Illinois with a Texas sized appetite, thin figure, puffy blonde hair

Or you can choose more options.
13.title: New Teachers

135.content:
Lara Reiner- New teaching assistant. 24 year old younger sister of Lauren, also former college softball player, lazy yet gifted with a fast metabolism and perfect figure, expects others to do her work for her

Tina Burke- 270 pound 35 year old English teacher. She used to be thin but developed a food addiction and bloated up. She's jealous of her students figures and has a fetish for fattening them up.

Or you can choose more options!
135.title: More Options

choices: As it turns out, Lara's metabolism isn't that good, she's putting on weight fast
Melanie finds out that Lara was a softball player, she invites her to a game
The kids no longer want the extra points, they expect some candy in exchange
1351.content:
“Aren't you happy sis? We have a job on the same high school, it's awesome” A very eager Lara Reiner said to her sister as she took a big bite out of a donut. Lara was very different to her sister Lauren, first and foremost their skin color was quite different, while Lauren had a tanned body and brunette hair Lara was more of a peachy color with brown hair, both differentiated them the most was their personality and attitude towards fat: Lara was way more carefree than her sister, while Lauren spend hours training and exercising to maintain her perfect figure Lara stayed at her couch all day eating popcorn, if it wasn't for her inhuman metabolism Lara would be giant butterball right now.

“I'm quite happy about but I know you way to well, tell me that you're going to watch what you eat while you're working”

“Oh come on sis, you know I've never put a single pound”

“Lara, you aren't a kid anymore, you're 24, your metabolism will start to slow down and if you don't watch your diet and exercise you're going to end up as that Melanie Bauman”

“Yeeeeah, funny that you mention her... She's the teacher that I'm going to be assisting”

“Seriously?! Lara, have you seen how much that pig eats? And worst of all is that her students give her a ton of candy every day. Lara, I'm serious, I really hope you keep your diet and don't end up as big if not bigger than her”

“Ok, jeez, you don't have to scream, I promise that I'll stay on my diet” Lara said as she took the final bite out of her donut, unknowingly to her sister, Lara had actually crossed her finger behind her back, Lauren was worrying too much. Lara wasn't the brightest girl in the world, she relied on her looks and her curves, she had a perfectly trim belly, a beautiful face with gorgeous emerald eyes, her breast might not be the biggest ever but they were nice and perky, plus, she made up for it with her great behind, just like her sister Lara was gifted with a very generous ass, she took a lot of pride in it and try to show it as much as possible with mini skirts and booty-shorts.


Later on in the day

Lara was on her way to meet up with Melanie, she just had a big snack and yet she was eating some chips on her way to the classroom, she had to admit that the food was really good and with the teacher discount that the school had given her she planned on eating there quite frequently.

To her surprise, she was the first in the classroom, the chairs were really comfortable for her, something that she wasn't really used to as her large behind usually had trouble sitting in normal chairs.

Loud footsteps could be heard from the hallway coming closer to the classroom, shortly after, the bulky english teacher body made itself known, Melanie was downright fat in anyone's eyes: her belly hung down to her thighs, her breast were beginning to sag down, her face was puffy with a prominent double chin, her butt was enormous (Lara now realized why the chairs were so big, it was obvious that they had her in mind when they brought them in). Lara had a mixture of disgust and intrigue on her face.

“Oh hello! You must be Lara, right? I'm Melanie, sorry for the delay, as you can tell I'm not the fittest person here” Melanie patted her belly to reaffirm her point “Please, grab some candy, I have a bit too much even for me, the kids always give me some of their own, they're in part guilty for my weight” Melanie said with a smile as she gave Lara a couple of chocolate bars.

Lara's eyes light up as she heard the magnificent news if the kids always gave Melanie sweets that would mean that they would also give her a ton of sweets, and if they didn't she could always eat some from Melanie's drawer while she was giving the class “It's going to be a pleasure working with you” Lara said as she greedily took a bite out of a chocolate.


In class, things went just as Lara expected, all the kids were very kind and nice to Melanie and she handled the class without needing her help at all, meaning that she could just sit there and snack all day. As the class was about to end Melanie had to go grab some things from her car, so she asked Lara to help her clean the class in the meantime

“Ahg, I can't believe she expects me to grab a broom and clean this up-munch- I'm not the one that made it dirty in the first please, the kids should-” Lara just had a brilliant idea, she stood up and selected a couple of girls to make her dirty work “Hey kids, I know we don't know each other very well, but I want to make a good impression with you, how about this: you three clean up this class and I'll be sure to give you some extra credit” Lara didn't even finish her sentence before the three pudgy girls started to clean everything in seconds, meanwhile she just sat in her chair and kept on snacking, this was a good year.
1351.title: Teaching assistant, perfect for a lazy girl

choices: Lara Reiner realizes and try to stop eating the candy
her laziness keep her from realizing until it's too late
13513.content:
When they asked for candy instead of extra credit Lara Reiner only gave them extra credit as she promised them however they did not like this.
So secretly they plan to fatten her until she was Chubby plus if not fat plus they did this for several weeks somehow managing to sprinkle weight gain powder over the candy.

Over the weeks Lara Reiner was gaining 10 possibly 12 pounds if it wasn't for her having a lazy streak she would've noticed.
The 3 pudgy girls were secretly watching with bliss as Lara Reiner gradually fattened up into Chubby condition they had no intention to stop until Lara Reiner was fat plus.


Will Lara Reiner eventually realize what is happening in stopped eating the candy or will her laziness keep her from realizing until it's too late
13513.title: The kids no longer want the extra points, they ...

14.content:
1. Koleen Madison, 35, medium height, dark blonde, notoriously bitchy social studies teacher and the head varsity cheerleading coach. A very healthy eater, but susceptible to addictive food.

2. Melanie Bauman, 29, medium height, light blonde, overweight with a belly and butt heavy build. English teacher and softball coach, loved by her students.

3. Julie Hopp, 38, short, thin brunette, economics teacher who coaches Junior Varsity cheerleading under Ms. Madison.

4. Kaitlyn Lopez, 30, tall, blonde, very pale, very skinny, fairly relaxed and laid-back chemistry and anatomy teacher.

5. More choices.
14.title: Experienced Teachers

15.content:
1. Bethany Mueller, obese, curly dark blonde hair, overbearing/bitchy attitude, Claire Mueller's mother. Holds a job at JHHS as a tutor to be more involved in her daughter's schooling.

2. Brooke Horowitz, a medical doctor who's recently lost her job and taken a position at Jacobs Hill as a nurse. She fears that the constant sitting around associated with the job could lead to unwanted weight gain.
15.title: Faculty Members

info.brief_description: The staff and students at Jacobs Hill High School experience the effects of weight gain.
info.description:
Welcome to Jacobs Hill High! A high school in Suburban Illinois where weight gain is inevitable for the female students and staff! There are options for everyone, whether you want to wrtie about athletes, cheerleaders, actresses in the school play, artists, teachers, and more! Who will you decide gains weight?

Rules:
Only girls can gain weight
No Male Weight Gain
No Instant Weight Gain
No Vore
No Animal Weight Gain

Story created by Jrs722 and Qedrian41
info.pretty_title: The Obesity Epidemic of Jacobs Hill HS
